location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Arrangement: The papers are arranged in reverse chronological order from the rear to the front of the item.The subject 1187 (Persia) consists of two volumes, IOR/L/PS/10/450-451. The volumes are divided into three parts, with part 1 comprising one volume, and parts 2 and 3 comprising the second volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 278; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains papers concerning British interests and Russian policy in the South of Persia [Iran]. Part 3 relates specifically to the Bakhtiari Lynch road between Ispahan and Ahwaz.
